#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#define EPS 1e-8
#define INF 1000000000000000000

using namespace std;

typedef long double ld;

#define MAXN 100010
int n,m;
int v[MAXN],w[MAXN];
ld vmod[MAXN];

ld bin(ld a,ld b){
  if(b-a < EPS) return a;
  ld c = (a+b)/2.0;
  for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i){
    vmod[i] = ld(v[i])-c*ld(w[i]);
  }
  sort(vmod,vmod+n);
  ld sol = 0;
  for(int i = 0; i < m; ++i){
    sol += vmod[n-i-1];
  }
  if(sol > -EPS) return bin(c,b);
  else return bin(a,c);
}

int main(){
  int t; cin >> t;
  cout.precision(8);
  cout.setf(ios::fixed);
  for(int cass = 0; cass < t; ++cass){
    cin >> n >> m;
    for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i) cin >> v[i] >> w[i];
    cout << bin(0.0,INF) << '\n';
  }
}
